### Tender Description
A Temperature Control System is required for the National Research Council Canada. Suppliers must meet the mandatory requirements listed in Annex A of the Request for Proposal. Bidders may request a debriefing on the process.

### Contact Information
- Name:  Cristian Ardila
- Email: cristian.ardila@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
- Office: Department of Public Works and Government Services (SPAC/PSPC)

### Note
This tender has expired and is no longer active.
